climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: US Warranty Included. Compatible with Most GSM + CDMA Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will Also work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.
6.2" HD+ Max Vision Display, IPS TFT LCD, (1520x720), 271ppi, 3550mAh Battery
32GB ROM, 2GB RAM, Qualcomm SDM632 Snapdragon 632 (14 nm), Octa-core, Adreno 506
Rear Camera: 13 MP, f/2.0 + 2 MP, f/2.2, Front Camera: 5 MP, f/2.0, Fingerprint reader
body.description: Moto E is all about giving you more. More photos that stand out with a dual-camera system. More power with a battery that can go for up to two days. And more fun thanks to an ultra-wide display for your favorite movies, shows, apps, and games. more screen = more fun​. Bring your favorite movies, shows, websites, and games to life on an ultra-wide 6.2” Max Vision HD+ display. You’ll love being able to see so much and still hold moto e comfortably in one hand. dual cameras. fantastic photos. Take photos to remember with a fast-focusing 13 MP dual-camera system. Play with depth of field by adding beautiful bokeh effects to your portraits or have fun swapping out the background entirely with Cutout mode. up to 2 days of battery. Stream movies and music for hours, play games longer and browse with confidence knowing you have a 3550 mAh battery designed to go for up to two days. ultra-responsive performance​. Your favorite apps, games, shows, movies, and more run smoothly and respond instantly thanks to a Qualcomm Snapdragon 632 octa-core processor. your fingerprint is your password​. Unlock your phone instantly with one tap on the fingerprint reader on the back of moto e.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good phone thus far
reviews.reviewText: I had an old phone that was giving me fits and didn't want to spend a ton of money on a replacement. I decided to try this reconditioned phone and so far it is performing to my liking. The touch screen is responsive and bright. It is light and easy to carry, battery life is very good and more importantly, I have found it easy to use. The camera works well as long as you have good lighting. If you want to work in low light situations then look elsewhere as the camera on this phone is weak in this regard. Bluetooth and wireless function very well, no issues with Internet connections. Sound is very good as well. It is pretty much stock Android, so transitioning from my old phone to this one was easy. My requirements are pretty basic and this phone gives me all I need at an affordable price. I would recommend if all you need is a good basic Android phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, very happy!
reviews.reviewText: Recently my ancient Samsung Galaxy S5 gave out, and I went hunting for a nice, mid-priced upgrade. This "renewed" Moto G Fast seemed to fit the bill. It doesn't seem to have Wi-Fi calling, but I don't really ever use that feature and wasn't concerned.It arrived neatly repackaged back in the original box (taped shut securely), and it was very clean when I took it out of the box. The USB cable and charger plug were still in their original factory wrapping. The "SIM Tool" was on its original cardboard holder, but the holder showed signs that someone had used the tool once before (as would be expected).Inserting the SIM and my SD card was easy standard procedure if you've ever done that on an iPhone. Once turned on, the Moto G Fast recognized my AT&T SIM and got right to business of running the setup wizards.Since then, I've been pretty impressed. It IS FAST compared to any phone I've used or seen lately, and the screen quality is awesome. I've only taken a few pics, but the quality looks good. It has a nice solid feel, and everything works as expected.The only issue I had was that my LTE mobile data seemed to be non-existent. I was creeping along at .19mbps. However, I read about a trick that all you have to do is turn on Airplane Mode for a few seconds and then turn it off. I did that, and now the speed tests show freakishly fast mobile data.From my experience so far, I would say that you can't go wrong with this phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good phone for the price
reviews.reviewText: There does seem to be a bit of bloat in terms of the space the OS takes up. On previous Motorolas, about 30-40% of the 32 gig space would be taken up by OS installs. On this phone, it is around 50-55%.Also, getting used to the gesture navigation (new to me) has been a bit of a learning curve. But you just have to build up that muscle memory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Incorrect listing, phone is locked to another carrier
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the refurbished phone, listed as Unlocked for major carriers. Put in my SIM and could not connect to network. Entered the IMEI in my providers website and was told that IMEI is not available for that carrier. Taking it to the brick and mortar for one last try with tech support. If the phone is still locked I will drop this review to one star and initiate the return. Very disappointed in the false listing.**UPDATE*** Confirmed with carrier tech support in person and on phone, this phone is locked to a different carrier. Also, when performing a hard reset, the system data indicated "oem_locked". Dropping the review to 1 Star for false advertising.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moto edge 5g (NOT PLUS) SOLAR BLACK
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful solar black color+ rainbow tint to it.... Got it for my bf it was in amazing condition refurbished is the way to go to save money! Not a scratch on it....unlocked but we had boost mobile and couldn't use our old sim cards so boost will make u get a new one bc old ones weren't compatible which is dumb....so instead it came with a At&t one sim card surprisingly so we decided to switch , been wanting to anyway great features , edge lighting lights up on the sides depending on the charge so if it's full charge lights blue all the way up but if low then lights lites up on sides quarter of way (I THOUGHT LIGHT WAS BROKEN BUT LEARNED WASNT) THANK GOODNESS SO BOUGHT TWO REFURBISHED PHONES TWO DIFF SITES THRU AMAZON 1. MEGA DEALS 2. AMAZON WARE HOUSE AND VERY IMPRESSED WITH BOTH....EVEN CAME WITH A LITTLE CASE FOR BACK OF PHONE WHICH IS NICE TO HAVE WHILE U WAIT FOR A CASE TO COME IN MAIL U BUY.....AND CAME WITH CHARGERS! LOVE THE MOTO EDGE 5G SCREEN IS BEAUTIFUL AND FINGERPRINT SENSOR IS ON THE SCREEN ITSELF CAN ALSO CJANGE THE SETTINGS ACTION IS U WANT BACK KEY LIKE ON ANDROIDS WHICH I PEFER..... OR CAN SWIPE DIFFERENT DIRECTION TO GO BACK SWITCH PAGES ETC WITH MOTO ACTION, CHANGE COLOR AND ICONS ALSO SPEAKER SOUND IS THE BEST YET AND LOUD!!!!

Llego en excelente estado, la pantalla estaba nueva, muy pocos detalles estéticos, el cargador es genérico, me llego con la memoria de 256 Gb justo como en la descripción con opción a extenderla. Las cámaras funcionan muy bien. La pila se calienta lo normal yo creo. Llevo usándolo dos meses y no me ha fallado en nada y responde muy bien con las aplicaciones y juegos. Muy recomendable

I bought this for my thirteen year old. I have a similar Motorola and honestly I would never pay the steep prices for a brand name. This phone had everything the higher end phones have, and it's just perfect for what he needs it for. Great battery life.
Bought this one It's the same as my old one. Everything transferred easily.

Lo compré y llegó antes de la fecha pactada, llegó perfecto sin detalles estéticos y hasta la momento no ha presentado fallos, solamente Atención: Es libre de compañía, pero NO acepta las Redes Telefónicas de Altan; de ahí en fuera, todo perfecto.
Está en perfecto estado funcionando completamente
